typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Column_1 as string,
		Column_2 as string,
		Column_3 as string,
		Column_4 as string,
		Column_5 as string,
		Column_6 as string,
		Column_7 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> src01customer
src01customer select(mapColumn(
		CustomerID = Column_1,
		PersonID = Column_2,
		StoreID = Column_3,
		TerritoryID = Column_4,
		AccountNumber = Column_5,
		rowguid = Column_6,
		ModifiedDate = Column_7
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> slc01customer
slc01customer sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	mapColumn(
		CustomerID,
		PersonID,
		StoreID,
		TerritoryID,
		AccountNumber,
		rowguid,
		ModifiedDate
	),
	partitionBy('key',
		0,
		TerritoryID
	)) ~> sk01customer
